list.title: coronatracker.com
list.description: CORONATRACKER.com is a community-based project powered by over 460 volunteers from across the globe, ranging from data scientists, medical professionals, UI/UX designers, fullstack developers, to the general public.

list.title: coronavirusinfections.org
list.description: Health information on coronavirus infections with detailed statistics from around the world. Data can be exported in 7 different formats.

list.title: coronavirus.site
list.description: RECOMENDACIONES Y MEDIDAS PREVENTIVAS PARA EVITAR QUE EL VIRUS AVANCE.

list.title: the2019ncov.com
list.description: Map, data and timeline of coronavirus (2019-nCoV).

list.title: wuflu.live
list.description: Real-time updates and stats for the Coronavirus.

list.title: go.gov.sg/covid-19-dashboard
list.description: Official Update of COVID -19 Situation in Singapore.

list.title: corona.rade.ir
list.description: نقشه‌ی مبتلایان به ویروس COVID-19 در ایران.

list.title: balad.ir
list.description: مراکز درمانی ویژه کرونا بر روی نقشه.

list.title: talksub.com/covid19
list.description: For US. Interactive map, per state data table, chart, news articles.

list.title: veille-coronavirus.fr
list.description: Tableau de bord de suivi de l’épidémie de coronavirus en France.

list.title: stayinghome.club

list.title: covid19esp.herokuapp.com
list.description: Coronavirus en Español - Panel de estadísticas en Español con los últimos datos recibidos.

list.title: italy.coronavirusinfections.org
list.description: Health information on coronavirus infections with detailed statistics from Italy. The data can be exported in 7 different formats.

list.title: covid-api.com
list.description: COVID-19 Statistics API based on public data by Johns Hopkins CSSE

list.title: ~~Coronavirus Tracker - latest information and news~~

list.title: Coronavírus - SUS
list.description: O Ministério da Saúde lança o app Coronavírus-SUS com o objetivo de conscientizar a população sobre o Corona Vírus COVID-19.
